table.name: vtiger_emailstemplates
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_emailstemplates` ( `emailstemplatesid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `emailstemplatesno` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `templatename` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `subject` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `template` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `templateonlytext` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_emailstemplatescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_emailstemplatescf` ( `emailstemplatesid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`emailstemplatesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
